# Welcome! {-}

<center>
![](images/ml_robot.jpg)

[Image source](https://cdn.redshift.autodesk.com/2016/05/Machine-Learning-hero.jpg)
</center>

<br>
<br>

This is the class manual for Statistical Machine Learning (STAT 253) at Macalester College for Spring 2023. The content here is maintained by Professor [James Normington](https://jamesnormington.github.io) and draws upon our class textbook, [An Introduction to Statistical Learning with Applications in R](https://www.statlearning.com/s/ISLR-Seventh-Printing-xwa7.pdf).

The vast majority of course content presented here draws from materials prepared by Professor [Alicia Johnson](https://ajohns24.github.io), Professor [Brianna Heggeseth](https://bcheggeseth.github.io/), and Professor [Leslie Myint](https://lmyint.github.io/).
